SUBSCRIPTIONS_WEBHOOK_ENDPOINT_SECRET.description: Secret provided by Stripe to sign webhooks

OVERDUE_INVOICE_THRESHOLD.description: Duration in days to allow open invoices before enforcing payment

START_SUBSCRIPTION_PATH.description: Alternate URL path to your start subscription flow

SUBSCRIPTION_REFUND_PERIOD.description: Time in seconds after an invoice is paid that users may refund a charge

AUTOMATIC_BILLING_PROFILE_DESCRIPTION.description: Use billing information for profile description

AUTOMATIC_BILLING_PROFILE_FULL_NAME.description: Use profile full name as billing full name

AUTOMATIC_BILLING_PROFILE_EMAIL.description: Use profile contact email as billing email

SKIP_CONFIRM_SUBSCRIPTION.description: Auto-submit "confirm subscription" if the user has billing information
